What is Cloud?


Using the power of CaseWare, CQS now offers you a complete online solution to suit your practice's needs

CaseWare Cloud Platform

Combining social networking, client portal, document management, engagement tracking and dashboard mining, CaseWare Cloud is a secure web-based collaboration environment for accountants and auditors.


 learn more

CQS & CaseWare Apps

Review on the Go & Time on the Go are only some of the new apps available from CaseWare. CQS is also proud to announce that TaxWare and Secware are now available on the cloud. Click below to find out more.


 learn more

Features


One Cloud. Unlimited Possibilities.

Client Portal

Clients can now log-in and view important documents.

CRM

All your contacts and clients in one central location.

Engagement Management

Manage your engagement with Caseware's Q app.



Tax Management

Submit your client's Tax returns directly to SARS with TaxWare.

Statutory Management

Ensure all your forms are submitted to CIPC timely with SecWare.



Time & Expenses

With Time on the Go, you can easily capture time and expenses wherever you are.

Analytics

CaseWare Analytics allows you to run analysis on your trial balance.

Online File Storage

With the power of SmartSync, you can now sunc files with the cloud
